channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR

item.title: Report X-2023120019
item.description:
Report X-2023120019

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-14T21:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-17
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived at QA and the outer box was wet. The box was opened and upon inspection, the cap of one of the bottles was loose. The cap was tightened. DescribePack: The plastic cap of the bottle was loose DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Loose cap was tightened to prevent further spillage

item.title: Report X-2023111252
item.description:
Report X-2023111252

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-13T18:12:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-20
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking, removed from sortation, an brought to QA. DescribePack: One jug of bleach had a cracked, leaking cap. Package consisted of 3 bundled packs of one (5.32 Liter) jug and one (946 mL) spray bottle. Tape on bottom of box had failed and box was open, contents were in a separate bin than outer package. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a lined spill bin and brought to appropriate damage processing area.

item.title: Report X-2023111305
item.description:
Report X-2023111305

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-21
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: EMPLOYEE FOUND HAZMAT PACKAGE WITH A STRONG SMELL COMING FROM IT. RESPONDER USED SPILL CART WITH ALL PPE STILL ON. FOLLOWED THE DECISION TREE TO RESPOND PROPERLY TO THE PACKAGE. THERE WAS NO SPILL OR AFFECTED MATERIAL TO CLEAN UP AND REMOVE FROM THE SITE. THEN TRANSPORTED THE PACKAGE TO THE PACKAGE SERVICE CENTER FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. UPON INSPECTING THE HAZMAT CONTAINER INSIDE OF THE BOX, THERE WAS RESIDE ON AND AROUND THE CAP INDICATING A LEAK HAD OCCURED. THE CAP ITSELF WAS NOT LOOSE.

item.title: Report X-2023111058
item.description:
Report X-2023111058

  • State: OR

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER FOLLLOWED DECISION TREE PROCESS WHEN CLEANING UP SPILL. UPON RETURNING TO PSC, RMP WAS NOTIFIED OF POSSIBLE UNDECLARED. RMP CALLED HMSC FOR UNDECLARED. PACKAGE HELD FOR ADG COMPLIANCE.

item.title: Report X-2023110890

Report X-2023110890

  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WHEN PACKAGE ARRIVED IT WAS SOILED DUE TO CONTENTS LEAKING IT WAS THEN PLACED INTO A HAZMAT DRUM DescribePack: CONTENTS HAD LOOSE CAPS CAUSING CONTENTS TO LEAK SOILING BOX DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: CONTENTS WERE TOOK OUT OF SOILED BOX AND PLACED INTO A HAZMAT DRUM

item.title: Report X-2023110719
item.description:
Report X-2023110719

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-08T18:13:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-02
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS DROPPED DURING SORTATION AND THE LACK OF AN INNER PLASTIC BAG ALLOWED THE CLOSURE TO VENT AND LEAK. DescribePack: LEAKAGE CAME FROM THE VENTED CLOSURE, WHICH WAS AROUND 1 1/2 INCHES IN DIAMETER. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN PLASTIC TOTE AND BROUGHT TO QA FOR INSPECTION.

item.title: Report X-2023110706
item.description:
Report X-2023110706

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-08T18:13:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-02
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking as it was being loaded into the truck for delivery, removed from sortation and brought to QA. DescribePack: One of four 1 gallon bottle had a loose cap. Only inner packing is a fiberboard box. No hazardous markings. There is a spot on the side of the box where a UN label may be placed however it is blank. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was brought to appropriate damage processing area.
